titleInfo.title: Evolutionary Composition of Music with Learned Melody Evaluation
Proceedings of the Int. Conference on COMPUTATIONAL INTELLIGENCE, MAN-MACHINE SYSTEMS and CYBERNETICS (CIMMACS '06)
